title: Significant Dependence on Regional Imports
description: In 2023, 50.79% of Nicaragua's total merchandise imports came from low- and middle-income economies in Latin America & the Caribbean, indicating a strong regional trade reliance.

title: Negative Net Official Flows from UNDP
description: In 2016, Nicaragua experienced a net outflow of $29,206.86 from UNDP, reflecting a financial deficit in official flows from this UN agency.
